text:
Bonny Sengupta is an Indian Bengali film actor. His first film was "Borbaad" and his second "Parbona Ami Chartey Tokey" both directed by Raj Chakraborty. His father is Anup Sengupta and his mother Piya Sengupta. He is the grandson of yesteryear actor-director Sukhen Das.
Bonny had earlier assisted director Raj Chakraborty for ' before his career as an actor.
